subject: Subject
resetPasswordDesc: Please enter your email to reset your password
resetPasswordSuccess: Please check your email for reset instructions
setPasswordSuccess: Your password has been changed. Please use the new password to login.
toDatetimeCannotBeBiggerThanFromDatetime: Check-out date must be after the Check-in date
dateSelectionShouldBeIncludedInSelectedM: Date selection should be included in selected month.
dateSelectionShouldBeInFreeTime: The property is already reserved for your selected dates
errorFaq: An error occured while getting FAQ data. Please try again.
emailSentMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you shortly - Frank Porter
checkoutAfter11: If check-out is after 11 AM the block will extend to 11 AM the following day.
addInfoAboutNewProperty: Add info about a new property
editProfile1stLine: To make the process seamless - this is a quick form which will provide us with necessary details about your property and area. Please fill out to the best of your knowledge and share any information you think would be valuable to your guests during their stay.
editProfile2ndLine: *please ignore any questions that are not applicable to you
comingSoonText: No one knows more about your property than you. Our team is working on a new form, which will allow you to provide us with information, which will be later shown to potential guests
accessCardQuestion: Do you require an access card/keys?
accessCardQuestionRequireKeys: I have an access card, but I require keys
accessCardQuestionRequireCard: I have keys, but I require an access card
accessCardQuestionRequireNone: No, I have both keys and an access card
